## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G21326](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G21326)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CIPK26</u>
- **Gene Name:** calcineurin B-like protein (CBL)-interacting protein kinase 26
- **Description:**   Ca2+regulated serine-threonine protein kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
